data.title: Andrea Ferro Photography
data.meta_description: Andrea Ferro Photography is an expert in .
data.text:
am an Italian freelance photographer and architect.

I was born in Padua and my artistic interests have always moved between many disciplines.

Although I got graduated in architecture, both in Spain and Italy, my passion for photography soon evolved into an expressive need and a way to discover, explore and understand, and I am always looking for new projects to get involved with. My interests range from social reportage to architecture photography and street photography, often combining them all. Most of all, I strongly believe in the possibility of producing knowledge through the photographic image, to understand the complexity of todayâ€™s world, by better understanding others and ourselves...
